summary: This bill, the "Hospitals As Naloxone Distribution Sites Act" (HANDS Act), aims to provide no-cost coverage for preventive opioid overdose reversal drugs. It amends titles XVIII (Medicare) and XIX (Medicaid) of the Social Security Act, as well as Title 10 (TRICARE), to ensure coverage for these drugs. The bill defines "preventive opioid overdose reversal drug" and addresses cost-sharing, mandates coverage for Medicaid and TRICARE, and requires the issuance of guidance to facilitate distribution and dispensing of the drugs.
